VoiceList.Entry: Aeris “You need to go through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7. Sector 6 is a little”
“dangerous so you'd better get some rest tonight.”
Aeris “Cloud…”
Aeris “Good night.”
Cloud “Oh,man…”
Cloud “…I must've fallen asleep.”
Cloud “Sector 7's past Sector 6… I should be all right by myself…”
Aeris “Cloud! I thought the Turks came back! Get some rest!”
Cloud “Can't get caught this time…”
Barret “Cloud!”
Barret “I'm so glad… I'm so glad you're all right…”
Marlene “Daddy,don't cry. Your whiskers hurt!”
Barret “You gonna go help Aeris,right? She's done so much for me…”
Barret “If the Shinra're involved, I ain't stayin' here! I'm comin',too!”
Marlene “Guess what? Guess what? Aeris asked me lots of questions.”
“Like what kind of person Cloud is. I bet she likes you,Cloud!” I don't know Let's hope so
Marlene “Dummy!”
Marlene “I won't tell Tifa.”
Cloud “Looks like I can rest here. Sleep Don't want to sleep
Marlene “Daddy, Tifa,
